Field Detail

count

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer count
READONLY: Returns the number of children for a given order item. If the item is a collection returns the number of collection instances. If the item is folder returns the number of the documents in the folder.

dirty

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean dirty
READONLY: Returns true if the OrderGroup has any changes: checks all children recursively

length

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer length
READONLY: Returns the collection size

Constructor Detail

OrderGroup

public OrderGroup()
Method Detail

addDocumentInstance

public OrderItem addDocumentInstance(Document doc)
Adds a specified document to a collection item.

Parameters:
doc - Child to add.
Returns:
The newly created child.

addItem

public OrderItem addItem(String childPath)
Adds a child to an order item.

Parameters:
childPath - String. The child path specifies the child metadata name. If a name path is specified all the intermediate order items are created. The name path specifies the metadata names of items separated by period.
Returns:
The newly created order item or null if the object is not order group item.

findAllBySearchKey

public Array findAllBySearchKey(String key)
Finds all order items in a subtree of the current order item that has the specified value as search key. The search key is defined in the metadata. Works only for documents that have a single search key.

Parameters:
key - The value of the search key.
Returns:
Array of order items that match the criteria or null if no match is found.

findItemById

public CwObject findItemById(String id)
Searches for an order item by given id in the subtree starting with the current item.

Parameters:
id - The id of the item to search.
Returns:
The found order item or null if the id does not match any order item.

findItemBySearchKey

public CwObject findItemBySearchKey(String key)
Finds the first order item in a subtree defined by the current order item that has the specified value as search key. The search key is defined in the metadata. Works only for documents that have a single search key.

Parameters:
key - The value of the search key.
Returns:
The order item that mayches the serach key or null if no match is found.

findItemByValue

public CwObject findItemByValue(String itemName,
                                String docName,
                                String leafName,
                                String leafValue)
Finds a document in the order by value of one of its fields. The search is done in the subtree starting with the current order item.

Parameters:
itemName - The order item name. Not used. Can be null.
docName - The fully qualified document metadata name of the result.
leafName - Name of the document field in the result.
leafValue - Value of the field to use for searching.
Returns:
The first order item that matches the search criteria or null if no order item is found in the given subtree.

getDataPathForId

public String getDataPathForId(String id)
Returns the data path for the item with the specified id that exists in the subtree of the current order item.

Parameters:
id - The id of the result order item.
Returns:
The data path of the item if found or null otherwise.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - on error.

getDocuments

public Array getDocuments(String ordItemName)
Returns array of all documents for given collection order item.

Parameters:
ordItemName - Order item name.
Returns:
Array of documents or null if the collection is empty or the current order item is not a collection.

getVisualKeyDocument

public Document getVisualKeyDocument()
Gets OrderGroup instance document that has to be used as visual key.

Overrides:
getVisualKeyDocument in class OrderItem
Returns:
Document or null if there is no instance document defined or it is missing

hasDocuments

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean hasDocuments(String docType)
Checks if the order subtree starting with the specified item contains at least one document of the given type.

Parameters:
docType - Fully qualified metadata document name.
Returns:
int Returns true if the subtree contains at least one document of the given type. Otherwize returns false.

hasOptionalItems

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean hasOptionalItems()
Checks if there are any optional order items that can be added to the OrderGroup.

Returns:
false if all added or method called under collection, true otherwise

isChild

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean isChild(String name)
Returns true if the given order item may have a child with the specified name. The child may not really exists though.

Overrides:
isChild in class CwObject
Parameters:
name - Child order item name.
Returns:
True if the child may exist or false otherwise.

newInstance

public OrderItem newInstance()
Creates new collection instance

Returns:
The new collection instance
Throws:
CwfException - if called on order item that is not a collection
